userreviews.userReview: [ 1) twin villain near the end seeking money and revenge, well, mostly just money. The hero and heroine could have easily gotten together without it at that point; 2) the heroine's panther. really pointless other than to show that the big gunfighter is scared of a little ole panther. WTF? Who wouldn't be scared of a panther living in some crazy girl's house!!  (hide spoiler)]

3,5★Me encantan los libros que he leído de esta autora, este no ha sido la excepción, pero todos los que leí carecen de epílogos, y eso hace sentir que las historias terminan de manera un poco abrupta, pero sólo tengo eso para quejarme, esta ha sido una historia entretenida con muy buenos diálogos y unos personajes muy agradables.

When a gunslinger arrives in place of someone else, at the ranch her father left her alone on, Cassie Stuart knew she had to run him off before he made things worse for her. Having sent for a peacemaker to settle a neighboring feud- not someone who would stir up a hornet’s nest- the man known as the Angel of Death simply would not do.Angel had never met a woman quite like the Stuart girl, not exactly a beauty- but definitely intriguing. At first thinking he didn’t even like her, he found himself surprised to want to stick around and help her out. To exact their revenge on Cassie for her meddling ways, the townsfolk force her to marry Angel- which ends up being little hardship as Cassie sees to his lonely noble heart and he’s decided she’s gotten better looking with every passing day. It’s when her parents- who’ve only talked to each other thru Cassie for years- show up, that things get turned awry… and Cassie and Angel not telling each other their true fears about romantic relationships, doesn’t help either.Angel takes off soon after, believing he’s not good enough for Cassie, and Cassie- though incredibly hurt- lets him leave. Still, being who she is, she cant let it completely go. She resolves to find Angel’s missing parents. Which of course she does.sighAnother sweet, quirky romance from the Dowager of Romance. These oldies by Lindsey read so easily and charm every time. Even on 100th re-read.
My favorite book in this trilogy.

Great followup to the 2nd Wyoming book with Joceyln and Colt. I love Cassie's spunk and Angel's patient nature with her. They were a lot more entertaining with their dialogue with each other than Joceyln and Colt.
[image error]

[I’m unclear why it took so long for the two characters to admit they cared about each other and wanted to remain married. I didn’t perceive any serious impediment to the arrangement beyond each character believing the other didn’t want it. It seemed out of character for Cassie not to openly discuss it since she was so extroverted and open about everything else. (hide spoiler)]

kangen sama HR Kocak,ringan, & pastinya romantis khas tante JL akhirnya terobati setelah membaca Angel Tadinya takut boring baca JL, yg akhir2 ini ceritanya krg menarik perhatian tp setelah membaca review an dr Mba Lely... bkin penasaran lahir bathin ckckckSebenarnya, cerita Angel ngingetin ak sama MMS(nvl JL yg pertama kali ak baca)Cerita + tokohnya krg lebih mirip sama MMS jugaAngel- Sebastian sama berbahayanya namun menggoda xD Angel, dijuluki Malaikat Kematian karena profesinya sebagai pembunuh bayarandisewa oleh Cassie bwt mendamaikan 2 keluarga yg berselisih karna ulah Cassie yg suka ikt campurbiar se-bete apapun Angel sm Cassie, ada saatnya Angel suka jg ngegodain Cassie gitu juga dgn Cassie, sejutek apapun dy dg angel tetap ga bs boong klo Angel udh bikin dy terpesonalucunya,klo Angel udh bete sama Cassie, bertambah akut pula dgn piaraan Cassie,namanya Marabelle---macan kumbang hitam yg galak (krg lbh mirip Cassie hehehe) ditengah pekerjaan nya,karena suatu keadaan terdesak, Angel-Cassie diharuskan menikah (jrengg..jrengg..)Cassie Kelabakan, Angel manfaatkan keadaan hehehehe....tp syg pernikahan mereka seumur jagung msh ada tp nya..mereka balikan lg koq...( HR Always Happy End )plg seneng waktu Angel dibayar lagi sama Catherine --ibunda nya Cassie-- bwt bebasin Cassie yg jd korban penculikanCatherine : "Kalau begitu biarkan aku membayarmu"Angel : "Untuk menyelamatkan istriku?" (memandang dgn tajam), "Dia masih istriku kan?"Nahhhhh Speechless dah itu ibu mertua :D

This book has been on my 'Keeper shelf' for a long time and I've enjoyed reading it a few times. A hired gun and a trouble maker, I love it. This book has a hero who can love without being a controlling, domineering man. A heroin who just can't help but meddle in other people's business. This book has a nice romance, a lot of humor, and great character development. It will remain on my keeper shelf.

Listed as the third book in the Wyoming series by Johanna Lindsey. Set in the old west in 1881, Angel comes to Texas to paid a debt for an old friend. His debt is to help Cassie Stuart. But Angel is a gunfighter and Cassie wants her problems solved peacefully, without anyone getting hurt.One of the better historical western romances in my opinion. Loved the characters and humor and found it delightful and entertaining. Just what a book is suppose to be.

Am I the only one who thinks the story was boring?I usually love J.L.'s stories but this time it was shallow and predictable... Sorry, but that's how I felt reading the book!
what a GREAT read !! And I didn't even blink at the elephant or black panther as pets during 1881!! Fabulously funny!
I like it!

I read this s because of a recommendation based on many "Old West" romances I love.Rather annoying heroine. She is spoilt. She owns a wild animal (panther). And the plot is often illogical. Disappointed.

One of my favorite booksI enjoyed the characters in this book especially Angel and Cassie. I have read this book over and over again and enjoy it more each time. I hate to see it and and hope that someday these characters will make an appearance in another book.
I am always up for a good romance. Johanna's has written some of my favorites and I owned many of them for a very long time.
leído en Marzo 2015**3.5 estrellas
I first read this book in high school and still love it. It is a good story without that feeling of inequality between the hero and heroine that so often happens in historic and harlequin romances.
A peasant surprise! pure entertainment!
My absolute favorite of all Johanna's books. My copy is so worn out from being re-read!
one of my favorite Johanna Lindsey novels. I love Angel and Cassie
Nobody told me that this book would be so funny.Definitely recommended.
I love this bookLove love love love love this book, i can't say how many times I've read it. This won't be the last time either.
Terminado!! Me ha gustado bastante, aunque la traducción deja bastante que desear!! La historia es bonita y original!!
I enjoyed reading this story.

I have finally found my all time favorite romance book. It name is “Angel”. It has all good elements that I am attracted to. I love “Cassie & Angel”. They are the best hero and heroine out of all books I have read. They are both average looking. They care about other people. Cassie is a soft hearted person. She is neither spoiled brat nor foul mouth. She is polished with big heart. Angel on otherhand does not want to admit his kind nature, nather his “work of line” speak for himself. I also like all other secondary characters. Miss Lidsey wrote so many books but this one is the BEST.

description: Hoping to cool off a twenty-five-year-old feud between two neighboring families, Cassie Stuart only succeeds in pouring kerosene on the flames. Both sides have warned her to get out of Texas pronto. . .or they will burn her father's ranch to the ground. What Cassie needs is a peacemaker but she ends up with a widow-maker instead.He is called Angel , a ruggedly handsome hired gun with eyes as black as sin. Unwanted and unwelcomed by his ungrateful employer, he would just as soon leave Cassie to fend for herself. But a stubborn sense of duty , and a desire to taste the sweetness of her kiss steels Angel's resolve to make Cassie want him, come hell or high water. . .and for more than his gun alone.
title:
Angel
      
          (Wyoming #3)
